name: Dangerous Mummy
description:
Welcome to the amazing world of Dangerous Mummy! Ready for an epic adventure? Join Rusty the mummy in his journey from the depths of the jungle to the magical world of the north pole to defeat the Evil Snowman monster! Battle dangerous enemies while you cross mountains, deserts, caves, forests and many more incredible places!

Features :

- Easy to play, this is a fun game for all ages!

- Next generation HD graphics with advanced 2D lighting and special effects!

- 55 different levels, set in 18 epic worlds!

- An epic soundtrack that will keep you on your toes!
